list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a figure of speech in which a word or phrase is applied to an object or action to which it is not literally applicable.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: her poetry depends on suggestion and metaphor
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Thơ cô phụ thuộc vào đề xuất và ẩn dụ
